title: Office Culture Divided Between Old and New Staff
summary: Long-term staff resist new hires; cliques form. Re-anchor shared mission; address culture head-on and co-create shared norms.

scene.setting: Long-term staff resist new hires; cliques form. You feel team fragmentation; the hidden risk is productivity decline. The decision point is ignore or address culture head-on.

beats.narration: The division is visible. The decision point is focus on tasks only or convene and co-create norms.

dialogue.speaker: lead
dialogue.line: I want us to name the division and co-create shared norms so we're one team.

choices.label: Ignore the cliques and focus only on tasks and output.

steps.step: Convene one meeting: name the division; share vision and norms; include all tenure.

leader_lines: Ignoring culture doesn't fix it. Let's have one conversation.
scripts.closing_line: Clear vision and norms; inclusive of all tenure.

choices.label: Convene the whole team: name the division and co-create shared norms.

steps.step: Convene team; name the division; co-create shared values and behaviors.
One action: mixed teams, project, or recognition for collaboration.

leader_lines: We're naming the division. Then we're building one set of norms together.
questions: How do we build unified identity?
What behaviors do we expect from everyone?
scripts.closing_line: Shared values and behaviors; mixed teams or recognition.

choices.label: Side with the old staff and ask new hires to adapt.

steps.step: Focus on shared goals; hear both groups; set norms that apply to all.

leader_lines: We're not taking sides. We're setting one set of norms for everyone.
questions: How do we avoid taking sides?
scripts.closing_line: Shared goals; hear both; norms for all.

choices.label: Side with the new staff and pressure the old guard to change.

steps.step: Acknowledge tenure and fresh perspective; shared goals and mixed teams; one set of norms.

leader_lines: Unifying means no us-them. We honor both tenure and new perspective.
questions: How do we honor both groups?
scripts.closing_line: One set of norms for everyone.

system_prompts.mirror_call: Did you take sides or build one team?

outcomes.message: Culture may keep fragmenting. New hires may leave.
reflection_questions: What would have changed with one convening?

outcomes.message: Shared mission is re-anchored. Unity strengthens; productivity can improve.
reflection_questions: Which norm or action helped most?
How do you sustain unified identity?

tsp.weekly_pulse_prompt: This week we built shared norms and unified identity. (1-5)
